column1: 1,Verify Successful Login and Checkout for Sauce Demo Application,"Navigate to the home page, login, add Sauce Labs products to the cart, complete the checkout process, return to the home page, and verify the home page.","Step 1: Navigate to /

column1: Step 4: Click on button finish -> Navigate to page '/checkout-complete.html'
